3 namespace Ubiquity\views\engine;

5 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
6 use Ubiquity\controllers\Router;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
8 use Ubiquity\core\Framework;
9 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
10 use Ubiquity\translation\TranslatorManager;
11 use Twig\Loader\FilesystemLoader;
12 use Twig\Environment;
13 use Twig\TwigFunction;
14 use Twig\TwigTest;
15 
26 class Twig extends TemplateEngine {
27  private $twig;
28  private $loader;
29 
30  public function __construct($options = array()) {
31  $loader = new FilesystemLoader ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS );
32  $loader->addPath ( implode ( \DS, [ Startup::getFrameworkDir (),"..","core","views" ] ) . \DS, "framework" );
33  if (isset ( $options ["cache"] ) && $options ["cache"] === true)
34  $options ["cache"] = CacheManager::getCacheSubDirectory ( "views" );
35  $this->twig = new Environment ( $loader, $options );
36 
37  $function = new TwigFunction ( 'path', function ($name, $params = [], $absolute = false) {
38  return Router::path ( $name, $params, $absolute );
39  } );
40  $this->twig->addFunction ( $function );
41  $function = new TwigFunction ( 'url', function ($name, $params) {
42  return Router::url ( $name, $params );
43  } );
44  $this->twig->addFunction ( $function );
45 
46  $function = new TwigFunction ( 't', function ($context, $id, array $parameters = array(), $domain = null, $locale = null) {
47  $trans = TranslatorManager::trans ( $id, $parameters, $domain, $locale );
48  return $this->twig->createTemplate ( $trans )->render ( $context );
49  }, [ 'needs_context' => true ] );
50  $this->twig->addFunction ( $function );
51 
52  $test = new TwigTest ( 'instanceOf', function ($var, $class) {
53  return $var instanceof $class;
54  } );
55  $this->twig->addTest ( $test );
56  $this->twig->addGlobal ( "app", new Framework () );
57  $this->loader = $loader;
58  }
59 
60  /*
61  * (non-PHPdoc)
62  * @see TemplateEngine::render()
63  */
64  public function render($viewName, $pData, $asString) {
65  $pData ["config"] = Startup::getConfig ();
66  $render = $this->twig->render ( $viewName, $pData );
67  if ($asString) {
68  return $render;
69  } else {
70  echo $render;
71  }
72  }
73 
79  public function getBlockNames($templateName) {
80  return $this->twig->load ( $templateName )->getBlockNames ();
81  }
82 
88  public function getCode($templateName) {
89  return UFileSystem::load ( $this->twig->load ( $templateName )->getSourceContext ()->getPath () );
90  }
91 
100  public function addPath(string $path, string $namespace) {
101  $this->loader->addPath ( $path, $namespace );
102  }
103 }
